TASK: Insert an image
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open the Start menu to access applications
   REASONING: Need to launch a word processing application (LibreOffice Writer or Microsoft Word) to insert an image
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu animation and rendering to complete
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type to search for LibreOffice Writer
   REASONING: Searching is the fastest way to locate and launch the word processing application
   ACTION: TYPE("libreoffice writer")

4. Wait for search results to populate
   REASONING: Allow time for the search index to return matching applications
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on LibreOffice Writer in search results
   REASONING: Launch the application to begin working with documents
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.25)

6. Wait for LibreOffice Writer to fully load
   REASONING: Application needs time to initialize and display the main document window
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Click on the Insert menu in the menu bar
   REASONING: The Insert menu contains options for adding various elements including images
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.12, y=0.05)

8. Wait for Insert menu to expand
   REASONING: Allow time for the dropdown menu to render completely
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

9. Click on "Image" option in the Insert menu
   REASONING: This opens the file browser dialog to select an image file to insert
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.12, y=0.12)

10. Wait for file browser dialog to open
    REASONING: The file selection dialog needs time to load and display available files
    ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

11. Navigate to Pictures folder or select an image file
    REASONING: Need to locate and select an image file to insert into the document
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.4)

12. Wait briefly for file selection
    REASONING: Allow time for the file to be highlighted/selected in the dialog
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

13. Click the "Open" or "Insert" button to confirm selection
    REASONING: This action confirms the image selection and inserts it into the document
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.85, y=0.92)

14. Wait for image to be inserted and rendered
    REASONING: The application needs time to load the image file and display it in the document
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

15. Task completion
    REASONING: The image has been successfully inserted into the document
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: An image file should be successfully inserted into the LibreOffice Writer document at the cursor position. The image will be visible in the document and can be resized, repositioned, or formatted as needed. The document is ready for further editing or saving.
